structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Occupation Type Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Comprehensive classification of occupation types following ISCO (International Standard Classification of Occupations) standards and skill level groupings for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Total employed
structure:Code.common:Description: Total for all employed persons across all occupation types.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-68: Did not answer/not possible to classify
structure:Code.common:Description: Respondents who did not answer or whose occupation could not be classified according to ISCO-68.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-68: Administrative and Managerial Workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Administrative and managerial occupations according to ISCO-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-68: Professional, Technical and Related Workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Professional, technical and related occupations according to ISCO-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-68: Clerical and Related Workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Clerical and related occupations according to ISCO-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-68: Agricultural, Animal Husbandry and Forestry Workers, Fishermen and Hunters
structure:Code.common:Description: Agricultural, animal husbandry, forestry, fishing and hunting occupations according to ISCO-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-68: Production and Related Workers, Transport Equipment Operators and Labourers
structure:Code.common:Description: Production, transport equipment operation and labor occupations according to ISCO-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-68: Sales Workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Sales occupations according to ISCO-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-68: Service Workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Service occupations according to ISCO-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-88 (COM): Did not answer/not possible to classify
structure:Code.common:Description: Respondents who did not answer or whose occupation could not be classified according to ISCO-88 (COM).

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-88 (COM): Professionals
structure:Code.common:Description: Professional occupations according to ISCO-88 (COM) classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-88 (COM): Plant and machine operators and assemblers
structure:Code.common:Description: Plant and machine operation and assembly occupations according to ISCO-88 (COM) classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-88 (COM): Skilled agricultural, forestry and fishery workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Skilled agricultural, forestry and fishery occupations according to ISCO-88 (COM) classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-88 (COM): Technicians and associate professionals
structure:Code.common:Description: Technician and associate professional occupations according to ISCO-88 (COM) classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-88 (COM): Managers
structure:Code.common:Description: Managerial occupations according to ISCO-88 (COM) classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-88 (COM): Elementary occupations
structure:Code.common:Description: Elementary occupations according to ISCO-88 (COM) classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-88 (COM): Clerical support workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Clerical support occupations according to ISCO-88 (COM) classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-88 (COM): Craft and related trades workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Craft and related trades occupations according to ISCO-88 (COM) classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-88 (COM): Service and sales workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Service and sales occupations according to ISCO-88 (COM) classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-08: Managers
structure:Code.common:Description: Managerial occupations according to ISCO-08 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-08: Technicians and associate professionals
structure:Code.common:Description: Technician and associate professional occupations according to ISCO-08 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-08: Professionals
structure:Code.common:Description: Professional occupations according to ISCO-08 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-08: Clerical support workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Clerical support occupations according to ISCO-08 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-08: Plant and machine operators and assemblers
structure:Code.common:Description: Plant and machine operation and assembly occupations according to ISCO-08 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-08: Elementary occupations
structure:Code.common:Description: Elementary occupations according to ISCO-08 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-08: Service and sales workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Service and sales occupations according to ISCO-08 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-08: Skilled agricultural, forestry and fishery workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Skilled agricultural, forestry and fishery occupations according to ISCO-08 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-08: Craft and related trades workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Craft and related trades occupations according to ISCO-08 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-08: Did not answer
structure:Code.common:Description: Respondents who did not answer the occupation question according to ISCO-08 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: ISCO-08: Not possible to classify
structure:Code.common:Description: Occupations that could not be classified according to ISCO-08 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: Skilled manual
structure:Code.common:Description: Skilled manual occupations requiring specific technical skills and training.

structure:Code.common:Name: Low skilled non-manual
structure:Code.common:Description: Low skilled non-manual occupations requiring minimal training or education.

structure:Code.common:Name: Agriculture, forestry, animal husbandry, fishing
structure:Code.common:Description: Agricultural, forestry, animal husbandry and fishing occupations.

structure:Code.common:Name: Elementary occupations
structure:Code.common:Description: Elementary occupations requiring basic skills and minimal training.

structure:Code.common:Name: Highly skilled non-manual
structure:Code.common:Description: Highly skilled non-manual occupations requiring advanced education and specialized knowledge.
